mapper.select: SELECT companion_animal_register_code AS companionAnimalRegisterCode ,animal_information AS animalInformation ,m.member_name AS memberName ,aniI.animal_gender AS animalGender ,aniI.animal_age AS animalAge ,companion_register_date AS companionRegisterDate ,cancle_companion_in_date AS cancleCompanionInDate ,pro_space_code AS proSpaceCode FROM tb_animal_insert AS aniI INNER join tb_companion_animal_register AS car INNER join tb_member AS m on aniI.animal_insert_code=car.animal_insert_code and m.member_id=car.member_id;
SELECT member_id as memberId FROM tb_member;
